title: What could you do to a champion that would completely destroy it
body:
What could you do to a champion that would completely destroy it or make it useless.
i found this topic searching on a forum and was very interested on the responses even though there were not many but what really makes a champion broken

Some things i thought of 
- {{champion:157}} Using mana
- Removing {{champion:17}} Blind
- Removing {{champion:64}} W ( Would he be completely usless?)
- Or maybe even {{champion:45}} E
 
Let me know if you have any good ones! (if you do think of one what would you change it to) doesn't have to be removing a ability could be a passive, item or even summoner!

tbh you'd hurt Teemo more by removing the slow on R because you wouldn't get the full Liandry's effect.

You don't go AP on Teemo anymore because they deliberately fucked the scaling on his R back in the day. You basically just want as much Magic Pen as you can get and then you pickup Gunblade and Nashor's Tooth (that build is the only reason Teemo is sitting so high on Tier lists right now).
yeah i always went magic pen myself
really why's that?
The "burn" effect of Liandry's is doubled on movement impaired targets. By removing the slow on Teemo's shrooms you'd be cutting the additional damage from Liandry's in half.

Well with the introduction of the greatest queen of everything camille I think new champions are going to get a hell of a lot more broken soon, and I really wonder what they are going to do with the 120 odd champions that are not considered broken. 
The riot design team must have had a shared aneurysm for that one. 
"Hmm lets give her a good dash with enormous potential to outplay skillshots and play mind games with that gets enormous if there is something to hit, lets give her true damage and %hp damage, why not chuck in a 20% hp shield she can get for almost every trade in lane. Umm what is she missing, oh yeah lets give her a built in hydra that gives her uncapped % heals and also slows enemies in a huge, obnoxious cone that requires almost zero aiming to hit and make her reactivatable skill have perfect synergy with triforce. Oh and lets chuck in a J4 x Gragas ult that stops EVERYTHING from escaping. I hope we didnt forget anything...

Would removing any of these destroy her?
Yeah i guess
How to destroy any champions kit? Remove any one of their abilities. Done.

I think things like Kayle losing her w would be alot less impactful than say Azir losing his w. Like if you were playing the champion in normals you could probably get away with not leveling certain abilities at all (though this is a bad thing to do), whereas with others if you don't get a core ability, you're pretty much screwed.
